text: Edward George Barnard (born 20 November 1995) is an English cricketer who plays for Worcestershire County Cricket Club. A batting all-rounder, he bowls right-arm fast-medium, and bats right-handed. He made his first-class debut for Worcestershire against Hampshire in May 2015. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Shrewsbury Category:People educated at Shrewsbury School Category:English cricketers Category:Worcestershire cricketers Category:Shropshire cricketers
title: Ed Barnard
